metadata.title: CVE-2022-48837 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:usb: gadget: rndis: prevent integer overflow in rndis_set_response()If "BufOffset" is very large the "BufOffset + 8" operation can have aninteger overflow.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48837` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
